name: Dungeon Assembly
description:
You are a dungeon master building the best dungeon to store all of your loot and treasure in! However, you find yourself trapped and must build to escape!

How to play:

- Touch the blueprint to enable build mode, left click drag to place objects with the sufficient funds and right click placed objects to sell them! (Or press the "sell all" button)

- WASD [SPACE] or Arrow keys to move!

- Reach the door at the end of the level and press 'e' to proceed!

To change music or effects volume, go to settings in the main menu!

Credits:

karelessocelot for the cover image, main menu, and the music!
